name: Intrepid 2D Game Library
short_description: Intrepid is an object-oriented 2D game programming library written in C++ utilizing OpenGL and SDL that takes care of the low-level programming involved in making 2D games.You can create nearly every kind of 2D game. Comes with collision-detection, phy..
